Jotunn glared at Elder for a few tense moments, then started
chuckling, a c=
huckle that soon turned into a full fledged laugh.

Jotunn: Ah! Elder! Of c=
ourse, I can only blame myself for the
confusion. (He stopped being pleasan=
t) But then again, I must explain
 my action once more. If I am to protect =
this planet against the
Minions, I need the means to do that. I order for m=
e to have the means
to give you freedom, I must wrench it out of the hands =
of people like
Razorwing who distrust me at every occasion. I am being depi=
cted as a
tyrant and a madbot, I know, but that, ultimately, is for no othe=
r
reason than the greater good. I will protect my fellow transformers no
ma=
tter the cost!

At that, he swung his axe at Scorponok, clearly trying to s=
evere his tail.

Jotunn: The Decepticon brought dishonesty and corruption. =
They killed.
I hate them for that. They forgot their priorities. I don't!

=
